resources.string:
Ramesh Khachi 
 Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya 
 Rekong Peo, District Kinnaur 
 Himachal Pradesh, PIN 172107
(World Record Holder in Guinness Book of Records-1994)

Broke an existing World Record in Static Wall Sit (Modified UTKAT ASAN) in September 1992.
His World Record for this Yoga Asan was entered in the Guinness Book of Records (UK)-1994 at page no. 268 under the Chapter “Gymnastics”.
The achievement was also entered in the Limca Book of Records (India)-1994.
Represented India in International Keyboarding Competition (Text Production by PC)-2006 organized by Intersteno, Belgium in May 2006.
The First National Arbiter in Chess from Himachal Pradesh (India).
